attributes.action: Now we're out of the EU, lets get our stuff back
attributes.background: We want rid of dull LED bulbs lets get back our 60w bulbs. Let's bring back pounds and ounces. Let us have powerful vacuums that actually work and let's get rid of the bag charge!!

rejection.details:
The UK has not yet left the EU. In any case, we're not sure exactly what action you would like the Government and Parliament to take. 

 You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
